title: Me and My Shadow (CRS042)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Chelsea Hostetter first shared on the podcast in May of 2014 about a suicidal period she made it through.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Chelsea Hostetter, Kevin Allison)
